Module be.helha.applicine
Package be.helha.applicine.server.dao.impl

Class ClientsDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
be.helha.applicine.server.dao.impl.ClientsDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientsDAO
public class ClientsDAOImpl extends Object implements ClientsDAO
ClientsDAOImpl is the implementation of the ClientsDAO interface. It is used to interact with the database and perform CRUD operations on the clients table.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public Client create(Client client) throws DaoException
      Create a client from the given parameters. The client is then added to the database. If a client with the same username or email already exists, a DaoException is thrown. The client is then returned.
      Specified by:
      create in interface ClientsDAO
      Parameters:
      client - The client created
      Throws:
      DaoException
